name: Tracker Music
description: Vertical text-based step-sequencer software sampler music in the first and second gen module formats like .MOD, .MED, .S3M, .XM and .IT.

children.name: Amigacore
children.description: Gabber-like forms of Hardcore [EDM] written in first-gen trackers for the Amiga like ProTracker and OctaMED, resulting in a minimalistic raw lo-fi sound.

children.name: Demostyle
children.description: Traditional eclectic style of the Demoscene with a special emphasis on tracker techniques and samples, and combining numerous elements of completely different genres - from Italo-Disco, Progressive Electronic and Funk to Belgian Techno, Ambient and Drum and Bass.
